summary: Added Homebrew package manager with analytics notice and PATH instructions.
notes: Homebrew has enabled anonymous aggregate formulae and cask analytics.
Read the analytics documentation (and how to opt-out) here: https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics

Homebrew is run entirely by unpaid volunteers. Please consider donating: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew#donations
Next steps include adding Homebrew to PATH using the recommended shellenv command and reviewing brew help for usage.
